title: RedFeed for reddit
summary: unofficial reddit reader, simple,user friendly and uses same layout with website
description: unofficial reddit reader, simple and user friendlyIt uses same reddit layout with website, it uses low ram, has beatiful widget and needs few permissions. Support sharing to RedFeed for fast posting and has customizable themes.Features:•Full gif and gifv support (imgur, gifycat)•Multiple layout support•Configurable widget (with multi subreddits)•Supports tablets.•Watch (Wear) support for your reddit•Web based proxy settings.•No ads on pro.•Posting helper•Search aubeeddits and in subreddits•Slideshow reddit posts•Live reddit•Post filtering•MultiReddit•Dark and light themes•Search in comments•Fast link view on comments•View imgur albums from detail•Private messaging with your friends on reddit•View account infos•Supports reddit gold•Read subreddit infos•Supports all sortings•Low cpu power mode•Low resolution or no thumbnail mode.Permissions:INTERNET - To fetch reddit data.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS - To read widget sync settingsWRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS - To change widget sync settingsAUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS - To create widget sync accountWAKE_LOCK - To make screen awake (optional) (changed from settings)ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - To check network is availableCHECK_LICENSE - To check that you bought applicationreddit and the reddit alien logo, trademark and trade dress are registered trademarks owned by reddit, Inc., and are used under license.
descriptionHTML:
unofficial reddit reader, simple and user friendly

It uses same reddit layout with website, it uses low ram, has beatiful widget and needs few permissions. Support sharing to RedFeed for fast posting and has customizable themes.

Features:
•Full gif and gifv support (imgur, gifycat)
•Multiple layout support
•Configurable widget (with multi subreddits)
•Supports tablets.
•Watch (Wear) support for your reddit
•Web based proxy settings.
•No ads on pro.
•Posting helper
•Search aubeeddits and in subreddits
•Slideshow reddit posts
•Live reddit
•Post filtering
•MultiReddit
•Dark and light themes
•Search in comments
•Fast link view on comments
•View imgur albums from detail
•Private messaging with your friends on reddit
•View account infos
•Supports reddit gold
•Read subreddit infos
•Supports all sortings
•Low cpu power mode
•Low resolution or no thumbnail mode.

Permissions:
INTERNET - To fetch reddit data.
READ_SYNC_SETTINGS - To read widget sync settings
WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS - To change widget sync settings
AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS - To create widget sync account
WAKE_LOCK - To make screen awake (optional) (changed from settings)
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - To check network is available
CHECK_LICENSE - To check that you bought application

reddit and the reddit alien logo, trademark and trade dress are registered trademarks owned by reddit, Inc., and are used under license.
comments: Definitely like it, interface can be and I am sure will be improved by the dev. I like the whole overall package! Nice work dev!
recentChanges: * Added option to disable subreddit history
